name: Ballrollá
description:
A school project. Get out of the ocean. Gather points before they are sucked up by the ocean. Can you gather them all? Beat the top score!

OBS! Your Antivirus might flag the game, but I haven't added any malicious code so you should be fine! But if you're unsure then please skip playing :,)

Top five:

  1. 35.46062 - LucasHearts(V1.0) 
  2. 40.00000 - Dr.Boo
  3. 45.00000 - Bandage the Cowardly Healthcare Item
  4. 50.00000 - Blandalf
  5. 55.00000 - Da Binki

Requirements:

  • PC
  • Windows x64
  • Keyboard/Mouse or Xbox controller (A = Jump, L-Stick = move)

Current known bugs:

  • Sometimes the main player falls through the water
  • The player ball rolls around like crazy when in the water
  • Scroll like a mad lad/lady and you may see beyond the matrix

Unity Assets:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/grass-and-flo...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/handpainted-grass-gr...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/stylized-water-for-urp-162025
